Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi bowled Andrew Balbirnie in the first over
Tucker c Rizwan b Shaheen Afridi
Shaheen Afridi bowled 3 wickets in the powerplay
Delany hits a six over long-on off Shadab Khan
Delany hits a six over deep mid-wicket off Haris Rauf
Delany hits a six over deep square-leg off Abbas Afridi
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan wins the toss and elects to bowl

Pakistan predicted playing XI: Babar Azam (c), Mohammad Rizwan (wk), Fakhar Zaman, Shadab Khan, Saim Ayub/Usman Khan, Iftikhar Ahmed, Imad Wasim, Shaheen Afridi, Naseem Shah, Haris Rauf, Mohammad Amir

Ireland predicted playing XI: Andrew Balbirnie, Paul Stirling (c), Lorcan Tucker (wk), Harry Tector, Curtis Campher, George Dockrell, Gareth Delany, Mark Adair, Barry McCarthy, Joshua Little, Benjamin White
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan beats Ireland by three wickets to finish their campaign with a win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Central Broward Regional Park Stadium Turf Ground in Lauderhill, Florida
Pakistan enforced their two-NOCs policy strictly after the national team's embarrassing performance and first-round exit in the T20 World Cup in the United States of America
